translation.en: I hope so.
I know he wants to.
Grandpa makes us do our homework before we go to the lake.
translation.fr:
Papy nous fait faire nos devoirs
avant d'aller au lac.

translation.en: As he should.
But he doesn't help us like you do.
translation.fr: Mais il ne nous aide pas comme toi.

translation.en: Don.
I came to say good night.
translation.fr: Je viens te dire bonne nuit.

translation.en: You don't want to say good night?
translation.fr: Tu ne me dis pas bonne nuit ?

translation.en: I am tired of this.
You don't seem to care about anything.
translation.fr: Tu ne te soucies plus de rien.

translation.en: You don't care that you're back here with us.
translation.fr: Ça t'est égal d'être là avec nous.

translation.en: You don't care when the children come and visit you.
translation.fr: Que les enfants viennent te voir.

translation.en: You don't want to grow old with me,
translation.fr: Tu ne veux pas vieillir avec moi,

translation.en: or see the children get married.
You don't care.
You can take your pain away with that button,
but you are causing it to everyone else.
translation.fr: mais tu l'infliges à tout le monde.

translation.en: Welcome to McDonald's. Can I take your order?
Sorry, that's not on the menu.
translation.fr: Désolée, ce n'est pas sur le menu.

translation.en: Lord...
God,
does it really have to be like this?
The pain of the injuries,
I can handle that.
Even seeing the pity and the helplessness
in the eyes of the people who love me and care for me,
translation.fr:
dans les yeux de ceux
qui m'aiment et tiennent à moi,

translation.en: I can get through that.
But if this is as good as it's ever gonna get...
translation.fr: Mais si ça ne s'arrange jamais...

translation.en: I don't want to be a burden.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas être un poids.

translation.en: I was just trying to get back to Alvin and you took me to heaven.
translation.fr:
Je rentrais à Alvin,
et Tu m'as conduit au paradis.

translation.en: Can't you take me back?
Now.
I want to go back to heaven.
My home.
My home is heaven now.
Jesus, let me come back home, please!
Please let me come back home.
South Park hired me to be your interim while you're incapacitated,
translation.fr:
South Park m'a engagé pour rester
auprès de vous tant que vous êtes alité.

translation.en: so I guess you could say I'm out of retirement.
translation.fr: On peut dire que ma retraite est finie.

translation.en: Can I get you a magazine?
Would you like a milkshake?
How about a hamburger?
You lost quite a bit of weight, son.
Would you like for me to read to you from the Bible?
translation.fr: Vous voulez que je vous lise la Bible ?

translation.en: Or any other book, for that matter.
Really, no.
Thanks for coming.
You know, you really need to get your act together.
Sir?
You need to get your act together. You're not doing a very good job right now.
translation.fr:
Ressaisissez-vous.
Vous pouvez faire mieux que ça.

translation.en: I'm not sure I understand.
Besides that, you're a raging hypocrite.
translation.fr: Et en plus, vous êtes hypocrite.

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking...
You got all these people out there who care so much for you
translation.fr:
Vous avez tous ces gens
qui se soucient tellement de vous

translation.en: and you have no idea how much they love you.
-I know they love me. -Really?
Yeah.
You're doing a pretty poor job of letting them know you're aware of that fact.
translation.fr: Eh bien, vous ne le leur montrez pas.

translation.en: I don't think you're treating them right.
Now, they can't heal you,
but they would heal you if they could.
And if they could trade places with you, many of them would do that.
-Yeah... -And do anything for you
without any waver.
I don't want them to do anything.
Truth is, I don't even want them to be here. I'd just as soon they not come.
translation.fr:
En vérité, je préférerais
qu'ils ne viennent pas.

translation.en: I know it's inconvenient. They must have better things to do.
translation.fr: Ils ont autre chose à faire.

translation.en: I know that!
Why would I want anyone to come see me like this?
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas qu'on me voie comme ça.

translation.en: It's awful!
It's not your call.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas à vous de choisir.

translation.en: It's not about you.
translation.fr: Il ne s'agit pas de vous.

translation.en: You spent the better part of your life trying to minister to other people,
translation.fr: Vous êtes venu en aide à tant de gens,

translation.en: trying to be there for their needs,
and to be there for them through difficulty and tragedy.
translation.fr: les avez accompagnés dans leurs épreuves.

translation.en: I've tried to.
And yet you have deprived them of doing the same thing for you.
translation.fr:
Pourtant, vous refusez
qu'ils fassent de même pour vous.

translation.en: And that's all they have to offer you, Don.
translation.fr: C'est tout ce qu'ils ont à vous offrir.

translation.en: You're taking that gift away from them. I appreciate them.
translation.fr:
- Vous leur enlevez ce cadeau.
- Je les aime.

translation.en: I do. I know they want to help and I think that's very fine and all, but...
translation.fr:
Je sais qu'ils veulent m'aider,
je les remercie, mais...

translation.en: But nothing!
Now, I want you to let them in, you hear me?
You're going to let them in and let them help you.
I can't.
Well, if you don't feel like you can for yourself,
translation.fr: Si vous ne le faites pas pour vous,

translation.en: what about doing it for me?
What about next time somebody walks through that door
and wants to do something for you, I don't care what it is,
translation.fr: peu importe ce qu'il vous veut,

translation.en: say yes.
Let a few folks
express their love by doing something for you.
translation.fr: exprimer leur amour en vous aidant.

translation.en: I mean, promise me that you'll do that.
Look,
try it for me.
You're gonna need to get better at this.
translation.fr: Il va falloir faire mieux que ça.

translation.en: Now, this is one of the lessons that God wants you to learn.
translation.fr: C'est une leçon que Dieu vous enseigne.

translation.en: All right, I promise.
People are God's hands to meet your needs
translation.fr:
À travers les autres,
Dieu subvient à vos besoins

translation.en: and answer your prayers.
We'll just keep looking till it feels right.
translation.fr: On visitera jusqu'à trouver la bonne.

translation.en: What kind of house are we looking for?
translation.fr: Quel genre de maison on cherche ?

translation.en: Well,
probably something one story, manageable to get around in for Dad.
translation.fr:
sûrement un plain-pied,
pour que papa puisse bouger.

translation.en: Is Dad gonna be in a wheelchair?
Yeah. For a little while.
As the medical bills were mounting, Eva looked for a house that we could afford,
translation.fr:
Les factures s'entassaient,
mais Eva cherchait une maison abordable

translation.en: that would accommodate my needs once I was discharged from Saint Luke's.
translation.fr:
qui me conviendrait
à ma sortie de l'hôpital.

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, there he is.
Got something for you.
Look, let me do it. Looks like you need my help.
How are you today?
Not speaking to me again?
translation.fr: Vous me faites encore la tête ?

translation.en: Okay. It's a letter.
It says, "Hi there, we share wrenches.
translation.fr: "Bonjour, on a la même clé à molette.

translation.en: "Fortunately for both of us, our fixators are interchangeable,
"and we can borrow tools from one another."
translation.fr: "et on peut se prêter des outils."

translation.en: That's so cute. Look at that. It's a happy face.
translation.fr:
Adorable. Regardez,
un bonhomme qui sourit.

translation.en: -Who is this? -This is from Christy.
Christy is a teenage girl that lives in the next room.
She was born with one leg shorter than the other,
translation.fr: Elle a une jambe plus courte que l'autre.

translation.en: so she had to have surgery to attach the Ilizarov frame, like yours,
so that both legs would be of normal size.
translation.fr: pour avoir deux jambes de taille normale.

translation.en: She has a fixator, too?
She goes on.
"And we share something else, too. Pain."
She says, "I hear you scream at night sometimes, as you probably hear me, too.
translation.fr:
"Je vous entends crier,
vous devez m'entendre aussi.

translation.en: "Although our nurse says that you don't admit to it."
translation.fr:
"Même si l'infirmière
dit que vous le niez."

translation.en: Don't... Don't... Don't shoot me now.
I'm just the messenger, Mr. Piper.
And she goes on and says,
"You're not alone. Sincerely, Christy."
That is so sweet.
Can you get me a pen and paper, please?
translation.fr: Je peux avoir de quoi écrire ?

translation.en: I can if you acknowledge me.
translation.fr: Si vous m'accordez un peu d'attention.

translation.en: There you go.
I like that.
All right. I'll be right back.
That's my boy.
"Dear Christy,
"in some of my worst moments of self-pity, I think of never being normal again.
translation.fr:
"lorsque je suis au plus mal,
je pense ne jamais redevenir normal.

translation.en: "I believe that when all of the pain is over, "Christy, you will be a normal young woman.
translation.fr:
"Je pense qu'après la souffrance,
tu seras une jeune femme normale.

translation.en: "You will play and run and do everything a normal teen can do.
translation.fr:
"Tu joueras, courras,
vivras comme une adolescente normale.

translation.en: "You're doing something that positively impacts the rest of your life.
translation.fr: "Ce que tu fais va changer ta vie en bien.

translation.en: "Keep the faith.
"Kindest, Don.
"P.S.
"If God brings you to it, he will bring you through it."
translation.fr:
"Dieu t'a envoyé cette épreuve,
il t'aidera à la surmonter."

translation.en: It's not long before you go home. This is your first step in that direction.
translation.fr:
C'est votre premier pas
vers votre retour chez vous.

translation.en: My first step is wanting to vomit.
Yeah, nausea will get you every time.
Your equilibrium has changed.
You've grown used to being in a horizontal position.
I'd like my tools back.
Hi, I'm Christy, your long-lost pen pal.
Or Hopalong Cassidy, as my friends say.
Hi.
I'm Don.
-How are you? -Could be worse.
How's that?
Okay, you got me. It can't get much worse.
The endless reruns of The Brady Bunch at 3:00 a.m.
translation.fr:
Les rediffs de The Brady Bunch
à 3 h du matin.

translation.en: Yeah, well,
I wish my only problem was getting hit in the face with a football like Marcia.
translation.fr:
J'aimerais me prendre un ballon
dans la tête comme Marcia.

translation.en: I'd take a broken nose to dance normal.
translation.fr: Un nez cassé pour danser normalement.

translation.en: You'll dance.
Only the truest friends show up when you have to move.
translation.fr:
Seules les vraies amies
t'aident à déménager.

translation.en: Trust me, this is a vacation.
-Vacation? -Yes, from my children.
translation.fr:
- Des vacances ?
- Loin de mes enfants.

translation.en: Well, thank you.
Remember when Don's parents gave us this painting?
translation.fr: Le tableau des parents de Don...

translation.en: Yes, I remember.
I remember you tried to pawn it off on me and then Susan and...
translation.fr: Tu as voulu me le refiler, puis à Susan...

translation.en: And the Goodwill store.
That's not true!
-That is true. -And never told Don.
Is all this stuff going to fit in the new house?
translation.fr: Tout va rentrer dans la nouvelle maison ?

translation.en: I think so. This place just isn't gonna work for Don.
translation.fr:
Je crois.
Celle-ci ne conviendra pas à Don.

translation.en: You know, with all the stairs and him being in a wheelchair.
translation.fr: Trop d'escaliers pour un fauteuil roulant.

translation.en: Plus, the new home is closer to the church.
translation.fr: Et on se rapproche de l'église.

translation.en: That will be nice.
Just came by to check on you. See how you were doing.
translation.fr: Je viens voir comment vous allez.

translation.en: You're looking good.
I hear you're gonna be going home before long.
Anything I can do for you before I go?
That's a very fine offer.
I wish I had a magazine to read.
You do? Really?
I think so.
I haven't read one in a while.
Well, all right. Give me just a minute.
Jay B. Perkins, a retired minister, was a powerful father figure to me.
translation.fr:
Jay B. Perkins, pasteur à la retraite,
était comme un père pour moi.

translation.en: And I was grateful for his service to my church while I was incapacitated.
translation.fr:
Il a beaucoup aidé ma paroisse
pendant mon hospitalisation.

translation.en: This ought to do you.
There you go.
-Thank you much. I'll... -That'll keep you busy.
-I'll read them a bit later. -Yeah.
Anything else I can do?
No, that's... That's all I need. Thank you.
When you open the door and let somebody do something nice for you,
translation.fr:
Vous voyez, ce n'est pas si difficile
de laisser quelqu'un

translation.en: turns out not to be so hard after all.
You were right, Jay B.
I thought that
relieving people of the responsibility of having to care for me
translation.fr:
qu'éviter aux autres
de devoir prendre soin de moi

translation.en: was the right thing to do.
It wasn't.
They would heal me if they could,
translation.fr: Comme ils ne peuvent pas me guérir,

translation.en: and since they can't do that, they were caring for me
in the only way that they can.
I have denied them
the blessing of caring.
You've loved me enough to tell me the truth.
translation.fr: Vous m'aimez assez pour me dire la vérité.

translation.en: I won't forget it.
And I never have.
After 34 surgeries
and nearly four months in the hospital,
translation.fr: et presque quatre mois à l'hôpital,

translation.en: Dr. Greider said I could go home.
Bye, thank you.
Dr. Greider.
Hold up a second.
Tell me something.
Just how bad was I when they brought me in the night of the accident?
translation.fr: Comment étais-je le soir de l'accident ?

translation.en: I've seen worse,
but they didn't live.
Thank you, sir.
He would become a friend of mine from that day forward.
-Bye, Christy. -Bye.
I want you to call me when you get out of here.
Will do.
Hi, Daddy!
Hey, Dad!
How do you like the new house?
What do you think?
Welcome home, Daddy, welcome home.
I think I'm home.
There's the kitchen.
Did you put milk in it? I'm just gonna do this.
I know.
Is it good?
Smells good in there.
Why don't you... We're gonna play a game. Okay, you ready?
translation.fr: On va jouer à un jeu. Prêts ?

translation.en: Eva organized something called the Don Patrol.
A group of church members and friends who took care of me
translation.fr: Des fidèles et amis s'occupaient de moi

translation.en: so that she could teach and we could keep our insurance.
translation.fr:
afin qu'elle puisse enseigner,
pour l'assurance.

translation.en: The Don Patrol would arrive around 9:00 while I was still sleeping.
translation.fr: Ils arrivaient vers 9 h, avant mon réveil.

translation.en: Good morning.
I might awake to see one of the Susans knitting on the couch  at the end of my bed.
translation.fr:
Je me réveillais pour voir
une Susan tricoter.

translation.en: Or someone would be there with a toothbrush so I could brush my teeth.
translation.fr:
Ou quelqu'un m'avait apporté
une brosse à dents.

translation.en: Looking good.
Often times holding a glass of juice before I was done doing that.
translation.fr:
Parfois, on me tendait
un verre de jus de fruits.

translation.en: Maybe even offering an electric shaver.
All right, I've never actually used one of these before.
It's pretty simple.
You know what, it doesn't actually work.
translation.fr: En fait, il ne fonctionne pas.

translation.en: And a big lunch.
Turkey sandwich, oatmeal cookie, pickles.
translation.fr:
Sandwich à la dinde,
biscuit aux flocons d'avoine, cornichons.

translation.en: You can't pass up baby pickles.
translation.fr: Les mini cornichons sont à tomber.

translation.en: -I'll take the apple. -Okay.
Another friend might be reading the newspaper,
translation.fr: Un autre pouvait lire le journal,

translation.en: ready to entertain me.
Yeah, whatever you need. I'll even sing for you if you want.
translation.fr:
Tout ce que vous voulez.
Je peux même chanter.

translation.en: Some guests would even make themselves quite comfortable.
Hey, Butterfly.
Come here.
Butterfly, no!
Hey!
Hi, honey.
Everything okay?
-You sure? -Yeah.
It smells like pee in here.
I know. It was the dog.
It's okay if you can't make it to the bathroom.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas grave, tu sais.

translation.en: It was the dog.
Butterfly?
Hey, Dad.
Come on.
You can do it.
I did it.
I did it.
I walked!
I walked.
Oh, Lord, I walked.
What's going on? What's happening?
-Ma'am. -Where's Don?
-Ma'am. -Where's my husband?
Ma'am. I'd like for you to consider this as a private matter.
translation.fr: Madame, il s'agit d'une affaire privée.

translation.en: -Private? -Private.
-This is my house. -Hey.
I've seen it all.
Bet you haven't seen this yet.
What's going on?
I got my fixator stuck to the toilet seat.
translation.fr: Mon fixateur s'est coincé dans la lunette.

translation.en: Happy birthday.
This is a perfect day.
God has given me children so much better than I deserve.
translation.fr:
Dieu m'a donné de bien meilleurs enfants
que ce que je mérite.

translation.en: How can I ever thank you for all they mean to me?
You being alive is the gift.
translation.fr: Tu es vivant, ça me suffit.

translation.en: Dad, will you dance with me?
Sweetie, I'd like to, but...
Please, Dad.
-I don't think I can. -Please?
translation.fr:
- Je ne peux pas.
- S'il te plaît ?

translation.en: I need you to help me up here.
David!
What are you doing here?
I'm in town for a discipleship weekend.
translation.fr: Je suis en mission de fidélisation.

translation.en: It's the excuse I use to come into the house and spend time with you.
translation.fr:
Mon excuse
pour venir passer du temps avec toi.

translation.en: Thank you for your friendship,
and your relentless commitment to prayer.
translation.fr: et ton éternel dévouement pour la prière.

translation.en: Of course, Don. How you feeling now?
translation.fr: C'est normal. Comment tu te sens ?

translation.en: In pain.
But I'm always in pain.
That's not the worst part of it for me right now.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas le plus dur pour moi.

translation.en: There are things I can't physically do anymore.
translation.fr:
Il y a des choses
que je ne peux plus faire physiquement.

translation.en: I'm not sure that God wants me to continue at South Park.
translation.fr:
Dieu ne veut pas que je reste
à South Park.

translation.en: I feel loved and needed there,
translation.fr: Je m'y sens aimé et utile,

translation.en: but I'm not sure it's where I should be.
What did you learn from your accident and your recovery experience?
translation.fr:
Que t'ont appris ton accident
et ton rétablissement ?

translation.en: Letting other people inside.
translation.fr: À laisser venir les autres à moi.

translation.en: Allowing others to help me.
But in the midst of all the suffering and despondency,
translation.fr:
Mais dans toute cette souffrance
et ce découragement,

translation.en: David,
I've learned that heaven is real.
translation.fr: j'ai appris que le paradis existait.

translation.en: What do you mean by that?
I died that day.
The next moment, I stood in heaven.
translation.fr: Ensuite, je suis allé au paradis.

translation.en: Why haven't you mentioned this before?
I have two very good reasons for that.
Number one, I go around talking about having been to heaven,
translation.fr: Déjà, si je prétends être allé au paradis,

translation.en: people will think I'm nuts.
Why would you think that?
-You just told me. -Number two...
-I don't think you're nuts. -Number two.
I don't want to go over that experience again.
translation.fr: je ne veux pas revivre ça.

translation.en: It's too personal, too special.
It's my sacred secret.
Is it possible that God took you to heaven,
translation.fr:
Se peut-il que Dieu t'ait emmené
au paradis

translation.en: brought you back,
so that you could share your experience with others?
translation.fr: pour que tu partages cette expérience ?

translation.en: Don't you realize what a powerful encouragement you could be?
translation.fr:
Ne vois-tu pas comme
tu pourrais encourager les autres ?

translation.en: I want you to make a covenant with me.
-What kind of a covenant? -It's simple.
Find someone you trust.
Share a little bit about your story, just to gauge their response.
translation.fr:
Raconte un peu ton histoire,
évalue sa réaction.

translation.en: If they think you're crazy or you hallucinated,
translation.fr: Si elle te croit fou ou illuminé,

translation.en: I promise... I promise, you never have to talk about it again.
translation.fr:
je te jure que
tu n'auras plus à en parler.

translation.en: But if they rejoice with you and urge you to tell them more,
translation.fr:
Mais si elle se réjouit
et veut en savoir plus,

translation.en: I want you to take it as a sign.
A sign that God wants you to talk about those 90 minutes you spent in heaven.
translation.fr:
Que Dieu veut que tu racontes
tes 90 minutes au paradis.

translation.en: I think I can do that much.
When?
Soon.
I promise.
Very soon, right?
All right, very soon.
-Hi, honey. -Hi, darling.
Hey, David. Glad you could make it.
translation.fr: David. Contente que tu aies pu venir.

translation.en: Soon as in now.
-Honey? -Yes.
Darling, I want to tell you something.
translation.fr: J'ai quelque chose à te dire.

translation.en: What's that?
Remember the day I left for the convention?
translation.fr:
Tu sais,
quand je suis parti à la convention ?

translation.en: Well, that morning just plays over and over in my head.
translation.fr: Je ne fais que ressasser ce matin-là.

translation.en: And you said, "IOU."
translation.fr: Tu as dit : "Je t'en dois une."

translation.en: Yes. And I do.
Well, in fact, I think I owe you.
translation.fr: C'est moi qui t'en dois une.

translation.en: Don't I know it. I've been waiting a long time for that.
translation.fr: Je sais. J'attends ça depuis longtemps.

translation.en: I owe you an explanation.
Darling, would you sit down for a second?
Please.
You know, I died in that accident.
translation.fr: Tu sais, je suis mort dans l'accident.

translation.en: When I woke up,
I was in heaven.
You went to heaven?
Yes.
Tell me more.
When I died,
I didn't flow through a long dark tunnel.
translation.fr: je n'ai pas traversé de long tunnel.

translation.en: I had no sense of fading away or coming back.
translation.fr: Je ne me suis pas senti partir ou revenir.

translation.en: I heard no voices calling to me or anything like that.
Simultaneous with my last recollection of seeing the bridge,
translation.fr:
Au moment du dernier souvenir
que j'ai du pont,

translation.en: the rain,
a light enveloped me
with a brilliance beyond earthly comprehension or description.
translation.fr:
plus brillante que tout c
e qu'on peut imaginer ou décrire.

translation.en: In my next moment of awareness, I was standing in heaven.
translation.fr:
Lorsque j'ai repris conscience,
j'étais au paradis.

translation.en: It was perfect.
And I knew right then I would have no need sand never would again.
translation.fr:
Je savais que je ne manquerais
plus de rien.

translation.en: I didn't even think of Earth or of those left behind.
translation.fr:
Je ne pensais plus à la Terre
ni à ceux que je quittais.

translation.en: Though I did not see Jesus face-to-face,
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas vu Jésus en personne,

translation.en: I did sense his presence at every turn.
And I did see people I had known.
translation.fr: J'ai vu des gens que je connaissais.

translation.en: As they surged towards me,
I knew instantly that all of them had died during my lifetime.
translation.fr:
j'ai su qu'ils étaient morts
alors que je vivais.

translation.en: Their presence seemed absolutely natural.
It was as if God had removed anything negative or worrisome
translation.fr:
Comme si Dieu avait effacé
toute émotion négative

translation.en: from my consciousness,
and I could only rejoice at being together with these wonderful people.
translation.fr:
je me réjouissais d'avoir retrouvé
ces gens formidables.

translation.en: Donnie, I'm so excited you're here to join us.
translation.fr:
Donnie, je suis si heureux
de te voir parmi nous.

translation.en: I saw Papa.
You know, my grandfather that everyone called Joe.
I heard his voice and felt his embrace.
translation.fr:
J'ai entendu sa voix
et senti son étreinte.

translation.en: I'd been with him when he'd suffered a heart attack at home
translation.fr:
J'étais là quand il a fait
une crise cardiaque,

translation.en: and had ridden with him in the ambulance.
I'd been standing just outside the emergency room at the hospital
translation.fr: J'étais devant la porte des urgences

translation.en: when the doctor walked out and faced me.
The doctor shook his head and said softly, "We did everything we could."
translation.fr:
et a secoué la tête en disant :
"On a fait ce qu'on a pu."

translation.en: As I walked among them, I became aware of the wide variety of ages.
translation.fr:
En marchant parmi eux, j'ai réalisé
qu'ils étaient de tous les âges.

translation.en: Old and young and every age in between.
Many of them hadn't known each other on Earth,
translation.fr:
Peu d'entre eux
s'étaient connus sur Terre,

translation.en: but each had influenced my life in some way.
translation.fr: mais tous avaient influencé ma vie.

translation.en: Even though they hadn't met on Earth,
they seemed to know each other now.
One person in the greeting committee was Mike Wood, my childhood friend.
translation.fr:
Il y avait aussi Mike Wood,
mon ami d'enfance.

translation.en: He was a popular kid and became a hero to me
translation.fr: Il était populaire et je l'admirais

translation.en: because he lived the Christian lifestyle and often talked about it.
translation.fr:
car il menait une vie de chrétien
et en parlait souvent.

translation.en: After high school, Mike received a full scholarship to Louisiana State University.
translation.fr:
Après le lycée, Mike a reçu
une bourse à l'université de Louisiane.

translation.en: When he was 19, Mike was killed in a car wreck.
translation.fr: À 19 ans, il s'est tué dans un accident.

translation.en: When I attended his funeral, I wondered if I would ever stop crying.
translation.fr:
À son enterrement,
je n'arrêtais pas de pleurer.

translation.en: I couldn't understand why God had taken such a dedicated disciple.
translation.fr:
Pourquoi Dieu avait-il pris
un disciple aussi dévoué ?

translation.en: Through the years since then,
I had never been able to forget that pain and sense of loss.
translation.fr:
je n'ai jamais oublié la douleur
et le manque.

translation.en: Then I saw Barry Wilson, who had been a classmate in high school,
translation.fr:
J'ai aussi vu Barry Wilson,
un camarade de lycée

translation.en: but later drowned in a lake.
translation.fr: qui s'est noyé dans un lac.

translation.en: Barry's smile radiated a happiness I didn't know was possible.
translation.fr:
Son sourire respirait
un bonheur incroyable.

translation.en: And I saw my great-grandmother, Hattie Mann.
translation.fr:
Et j'ai vu mon arrière-grand-mère,
Hattie Mann.

translation.en: As a child, I knew her only after she had developed osteoporosis.
translation.fr:
Je ne l'ai connue
qu'avec de l'ostéoporose.

translation.en: Her head and her shoulders were always bent forward,
translation.fr: Avec sa tête et ses épaules voûtées,

translation.en: giving her a sort of humped appearance.
But the beautiful thing is she didn't carry these burdens in heaven.
translation.fr:
Mais au paradis,
elle était libérée de ce poids.

translation.en: Heaven was many things,
translation.fr: Le paradis était beaucoup de choses,

translation.en: but without a doubt it was the greatest family reunion of all.
translation.fr:
mais sans aucun doute la plus belle
des réunions de famille.

translation.en: A holy awe came over me as I stepped forward.
translation.fr:
Une béatitude m'a envahi
alors que je m'avançais.

translation.en: I had no idea what lay ahead,
but I sensed that with each step I took, it would grow more wondrous.
translation.fr:
mais à chaque pas,
tout semblait de plus en plus merveilleux.

translation.en: And I heard the music.
I can only describe it as a holy swoosh of wings,
but I'd have to magnify that thousands of times
to explain the effect of the sound in heaven.
translation.fr: peut décrire le son du paradis.

translation.en: It was the most beautiful and pleasant sound I'd ever heard.
translation.fr:
Le son le plus beau et agréable
que j'aie entendu.

translation.en: I saw a bright iridescence.
I peered through the gate yearning to see what lay beyond.
It wasn't an anxious yearning,
but a peaceful openness to experience all of the grace and joy of heaven.
translation.fr:
mais serein, prêt à recevoir
toute la grâce et la joie du paradis.

translation.en: At that very moment, I was about to realize the yearning of every human heart.
translation.fr:
J'allais prendre conscience
du désir ardent de chaque cœur.

translation.en: I was in heaven, ready to go through the pearlescent gates.
translation.fr:
J'étais au paradis,
prêt à passer les portes opalescentes.

translation.en: Then, just as suddenly as I'd arrived at the gates of heaven,
translation.fr:
Soudain, alors que j'arrivais
aux portes du paradis,

translation.en: I left there.
I spent a lot of time in the hospital trying to make sense of all of this.
translation.fr:
À l'hôpital, j'ai passé du temps
à essayer de comprendre.

translation.en: I was paralyzed by the notion of not wanting to return.
translation.fr:
J'étais paralysé par l'idée
de ne pas vouloir revenir.

translation.en: I mean, why come back to this much pain?
I think now I know.
I do, too.
I believe it's time for me to go back to church.
translation.fr: Il est temps que je retourne à l'église.

translation.en: I believe that, too.
Have you told anyone else about this?
translation.fr: En as-tu parlé à quelqu'un d'autre ?

translation.en: Yes.
David.
Are you hurt that I didn't tell you first?
No.
I feel elated to know.
Because it enables me to understand the man to whom I'm married.
translation.fr:
Cela me permet de comprendre
l'homme que j'ai épousé.

translation.en: Eva.
Yes.
Eva,
no one should have to do the things that you had to do for me.
translation.fr:
personne ne devrait avoir à faire
ce que tu as fait pour moi.

translation.en: But you did them,
faithfully, compassionately and without hesitation.
translation.fr: avec foi, compassion et sans hésiter.

translation.en: You come closest
translation.fr: Tu es la seule qui sache

translation.en: to really knowing how painful this journey has been for me.
Each day,
you endured it with me.
Eva,
you are my gift from God.
translation.fr: tu es un don de Dieu.

translation.en: I was so enthusiastic about finally returning to South Park.
translation.fr:
J'étais si heureux
de retourner à South Park.

translation.en: I hadn't been out of bed for more than an hour at a time,
translation.fr:
Je ne m'étais levé
que par tranches d'une heure.

translation.en: and, well, I overestimated my endurance and suddenly felt incredibly fatigued.
translation.fr:
J'avais surestimé mon endurance
et me sentis soudain épuisé.

translation.en: Yet, the overwhelming response from the congregation gave me
translation.fr:
Pourtant, l'énorme réaction
de la congrégation me donna

translation.en: a new burst of strength,
and I knew right then that their praise was for God's work and my healing.
translation.fr:
et je sus dès lors
qu'ils priaient pour ma guérison.

translation.en: It's only taken me
five months
to get from the conference at Trinity Pines back to church.
translation.fr:
entre la conférence
et mon retour à l'église.

translation.en: I may be slow, but I'm faithful.
They would like for you to say something to the congregation.
Eva, I think I made a mistake. I don't think I can do this.
translation.fr: Eva, je me suis trompé. Je ne peux pas.

translation.en: -You can. -I'm not sure if I'm ready.
translation.fr:
- Si.
- Je ne suis pas prêt.

translation.en: You are.
Let's hear it, Don.
Say something, Don, please.
You prayed.
I'm here.
Here he is.
Hey, Don! Don!
Hey!
-You made it. -Yeah.
It's so good to see you.
I believe that I'm alive today because you prayed me back to Earth.
translation.fr:
Je suis vivant car vous avez prié
pour mon retour.

translation.en: Tell you what, you buy me lunch, we'll call it even.
translation.fr: Invitez-moi à déjeuner, on sera quittes.

translation.en: -All right, it's a deal. -That's right.
I couldn't figure out how to get inside, so I just pried open the trunk,
translation.fr:
Je ne trouvais pas d'entrée,
donc j'ai ouvert le coffre,

translation.en: knocked down the back seat and crawled in that way.
translation.fr: rabattu la banquette arrière et rampé.

translation.en: But even when I was praying with you, I didn't know it was you.
translation.fr: Je priais, mais je ne savais pas avec qui.

translation.en: Besides, no one lives through that.
translation.fr: Et puis, personne ne survit à ça.

translation.en: Well, in my first moments of consciousness,
two things stand out.
First,
I was singing.
-I don't sing. -No.
What a Friend We Have in Jesus.
And the second was that Dick had climbed into the car with me
translation.fr: Ensuite, j'ai vu Dick dans la voiture,

translation.en: and his hand had gripped mine and held it tight.
translation.fr: et senti ma main dans les siennes.

translation.en: But the one thing that is absolutely clear
translation.fr: La seule chose qui était claire,

translation.en: was Dick being in the car and praying with me.
translation.fr: c'est que Dick priait avec moi.

translation.en: That's true. He did get in the car and prayed with you.
translation.fr:
C'est vrai.
Il est monté et a prié avec vous.

translation.en: But, Don, he never held your hand.
translation.fr: Mais il ne vous a pas tenu la main.

translation.en: Nope.
I remember it so clearly, though. It was one of the most vivid details.
translation.fr:
C'est pourtant un souvenir précis,
l'un des détails les plus frappants.

translation.en: It didn't happen. It was physically impossible.
There's just no physical way possible I could have reached your right hand.
translation.fr:
Je n'aurais jamais pu
atteindre votre main droite.

translation.en: But...
But I swear, I...
Someone was holding your hand,
but it wasn't Dick.
Dick Onerecker was a real prayer warrior before and after the accident.
translation.fr:
Dick Onerecker était un fervent croyant
avant et après l'accident.

translation.en: He would pass away only a few years after praying for me on that bridge.
translation.fr: Il est mort quelques années après.

translation.en: Okay, you guys, right in here.
-Hey, darling. Darling. -Yeah?
-I'll be right back. -Okay.
Boy, that really hurts, doesn't it?
Yeah, it hurts very much.
Yeah, I know.
Believe me, I know.
You do?
Yeah. I had one, too.
It's horrible.
It's just horrible.
It's awful, I know that.
I wore one on my left leg for 11 months.
translation.fr: J'en ai eu un pendant 11 mois.

translation.en: -Nobody ever understands. -Well, they can't.
It's not something you can talk about and have anyone understand your pain.
translation.fr:
On ne peut pas en parler,
personne ne peut compatir.

translation.en: -I'm Don. -I'm Mark.
Well, Mark,
you just met someone who does understand the pain
translation.fr:
tu as devant toi quelqu'un
qui a connu ta douleur

translation.en: and the discouragement you're going through.
I don't know if I'm gonna make it.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas si j'y arriverai.

translation.en: You'll make it.
You're gonna make it. Hey.
Hey, trust me. You'll make it.
-What happened? -I had a skiing accident.
translation.fr:
- Que t'est-il arrivé ?
- Accident de ski.

translation.en: You're a football player?
Yes, sir.
I'm gonna tell you something.
One day, you will walk again.
You might not be playing football, but you'll walk.
translation.fr:
Tu ne joueras peut-être pas,
mais tu marcheras.

translation.en: Here's my card. Number's right there.
translation.fr: Voici ma carte. Mon numéro est là.

translation.en: You can call me anytime day or night, 24 hours a day. All right?
translation.fr:
Appelle-moi à toute heure
du jour ou de la nuit.

translation.en: Now, I'm gonna walk back over there to my family.
translation.fr: Je vais marcher jusqu'à ma famille.

translation.en: I want you to watch me,
and as you watch, I want you to know that one day you will walk, too.
translation.fr:
et tu verras qu'un jour,
tu marcheras aussi.

translation.en: You'll probably do it better than I do.
You met someone who understands. Give me a call, all right?
Thank you. Thank you. Thank you so much.
Hey, it's not about me.
translation.fr: Il ne s'agit pas de moi.

translation.en: Before I died on that bridge, I was unsure of what my purpose was.
translation.fr:
Avant ma mort sur ce pont,
je n'avais pas de raison d'être.

translation.en: Now I see it more clearly.
Ministering and sharing the hope I found.
Over 25 years ago,
translation.fr: Il y a plus de 25 ans,

translation.en: that big truck took my life on that old bridge.
translation.fr:
ce gros camion m'a ôté la vie
sur ce vieux pont.

translation.en: I am not the man I used to be.
translation.fr:
PASTEUR PIPER
ATLANTA-5/3/2015 Je ne suis plus le même homme.

translation.en: I have been beaten up,
but I'm not beaten.
translation.fr: mais je ne suis pas brisé.

translation.en: I have chosen to be not bitter,
translation.fr: J'ai choisi de ne pas être amer,

translation.en: but better.
And it is a choice.
Every day of my life, I still ask the same question
translation.fr:
Tous les jours,
je me pose la même question

translation.en: that I asked in that bed, that hospital bed, every day.
translation.fr:
que celle que je me posais
dans ce lit d'hôpital.

translation.en: "Oh, Lord, why?
"Why did you let me see heaven and take it away from me?"
translation.fr:
"Pourquoi m'as-Tu laissé voir le paradis
pour me l'ôter ?"

translation.en: I believe it is so that I could be here with you today
translation.fr:
Je crois qu'Il voulait
que je sois là devant vous aujourd'hui,

translation.en: and tell you to your face,
God still answers prayer.
translation.fr: que Dieu exauce toujours vos prières.

translation.en: God is still in the miracle business today.
God is able to help us find a new normal,
translation.fr:
Dieu peut nous aider
à trouver une nouvelle norme

translation.en: and overcome tragedy and loss, pain and suffering.
translation.fr:
et à surmonter la tragédie, le deuil,
la douleur et la souffrance.

translation.en: And God is building us a better place.
translation.fr: Dieu nous construit un monde meilleur.

translation.en: Heaven is real.
I may not meet you here,
translation.fr: Je ne vous rencontrerai peut-être pas

translation.en: this side of heaven.
So my prayer for you today is, if I don't meet you here,
translation.fr:
Je prie donc pour que,
si je ne vous rencontre pas ici,

translation.en: one day I want to see you there
translation.fr: je vous voie un jour là-haut,

translation.en: at the gates.
And may God help us to be found faithful until that day.
translation.fr:
Puisse Dieu nous aider
à garder la foi jusqu'à ce jour.
